{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3496979,"name":"Ryan zheng","username":"Rzheng1232","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rzheng1232/{size}/182897_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-30T19:03:53.514Z","cooked":"

I have a quick question about converting my code to the RevLib2025 library. I’m following the example for adjusting PeriodicFramePeriod, and I was wondering if there is any way to specify which status frame to adjust in the new rev library. For reference, the example I’m following is here

Screenshot 2025-01-30 at 1.49.03 PM1492×1034 111 KB

and the code I’m trying to convert is:

motor.setPeriodicFramePeriod(CANSparkMaxLowLevel.PeriodicFrame.kStatus1, 20);
      motor.setPeriodicFramePeriod(CANSparkMaxLowLevel.PeriodicFrame.kStatus2, 20);
      motor.setPeriodicFramePeriod(CANSparkMaxLowLevel.PeriodicFrame.kStatus3, 50);```
Thank you!
","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2025-01-30T19:03:53.514Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":84,"readers_count":83,"score":41.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":484321,"topic_slug":"migrating-to-revlib2025-question","display_username":"Ryan zheng","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55168,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Programmer"},"post_url":"/t/migrating-to-revlib2025-question/484321/1","custom_user_title":"Programmer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3496998,"name":"Dan","username":"tekdemo","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tekdemo/{size}/138330_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-30T19:27:02.181Z","cooked":"

You now specify status frames specifically, with using the signals object on the spark max configs.

var config = SparkMaxConfig();
config.signals.analogPositionPeriodMs(10)

This means going forward, you don’t need to constantly look up the documentation to find out which status frame does what. For migrating though, you have to figure out what the old frames meant, and find the new functions to set those signals.

Is there documentation I can reference to figure out what each status frame corresponds to? I looked at the depreciated documentation and Rev doesn’t provide much description for each of the status frames.
